meanings.definition: A person or entity that holds a license to use, own, or operate something.
meanings.sent1: The licensee of the software can access all its features.
meanings.sent2: The licensee of the car must follow the traffic rules.
meanings.sent3: The licensee of the library card was thrilled to borrow so many books.
meanings.sent4: As a licensee of the streaming service, she had unlimited access to movies.
meanings.sent5: The licensee of the gym membership enjoyed working out every day.

meanings.definition: The holder of a license granted by an authority to do something specific.
meanings.sent1: The licensee of the fishing permit caught a big fish.
meanings.sent2: The licensee of the pilot's license flew the plane skillfully.
meanings.sent3: The licensee of the pizza delivery job was always on time.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the licensee of happiness when surrounded by loved ones.
meanings.sent5: The licensee of the concert ticket danced all night long.
